review_data.title: Love this little place
review_data.content: Situated on the side of one of the small waterways in Zurich, this is your archetypal laid back bar. Always consistent and usually populated by locals. Perfect way to spend a Sunday afternoon

review_data.title: Very good Coffee

review_data.title: Völlig unbrauchbar

review_data.title: Best coffee, beautiful terrasse and friendly efficient staff

review_data.title: good hang-out after work

review_data.title: Probably the worst espresso in the world

review_data.title: One of the best coffees in Zurich

review_data.title: Best cafe in Zurich?
review_data.content: Great place to meet a friend, good canalside drinking area - no hot food but a great cafe / bar scene. Good service and good relaxed vibe.

review_data.title: If you only have time for one café in Züri
review_data.content: ... go here - my favourite café, literally, on the planet (and I'm incredibly picky when it comes to coffee, atmosphere and service). The breathtaking patio overhanging the beautiful, tranquil canal (Schanzengraben) combined with stellar cappuccinos, lattes, cortados and espressos make for a top-notch place...More

review_data.title: Good coffee but no brunch

review_data.title: An attractive alfresco experience.

review_data.title: Zum Träumen am Sonntag Morgen

review_data.title: Needs a Manager!

review_data.title: Best coffee in Zurich
review_data.content: Fantastic coffee, deco decor and great service. Just outside the financial plaza, this cafe has the best coffee in Zurich along with the nicest help. They let us shoot some video for a project. Thank you.

review_data.title: Lovely,little cafe bar.

review_data.title: Nich but expensive!

review_data.title: A very nice visit

review_data.title: Nice and friendly - very nice tea sets
